quotes.quote: The only disadvantage of an honest heart is credulity.
We live in such a gullible world. Anything that's written, anything that's posted, anything picture that is interpreted one way is taken as truth.
People believe what they want to believe.
The public is gullible. ... If [many satirists are] making the same joke, that's the danger. Then there's a solidifying effect and it becomes a truth.
Being gullible is simply having the quality of trusting people easily.
A little credulity helps one on through life very smoothly.
Fame is proof that the people are gullible.
Don't be gullible, use life before it uses you. Understand there are no free lunches, and for every action you take, there's a reaction.
Most people are sceptical about the wrong things and gullible about the wrong things.
A gullible mind is a weak mind.
Could people be trained to be less gullible? Or are you as stuck with gullibility as you are with skin colour?
The cure for advanced gullibility is to go to sleep and consider matters again the next day.
Many people are gullible, and we can expect this to continue.
Swindlers are notoriously gullible.
Gods and politics are the tools with which the godless and unprincipled manipulate the gullible.
Credulity is belief in slight evidence, with no evidence, or against evidence.
Youth is easily deceived because it is quick to hope.
Gullibility is a knife at the throat of civilization.
When people are bewildered they tend to become credulous.
Some people say that taxes are the price we pay for civilization. But the runaway taxes of our time are the price we pay for being gullible.
